text: 4:10 Onger Akaba 36:6; 1 Korin 4:11-12; 1 Timoti 2:3-4Godɨn ikia mamaghɨra itim, a gumazamiziba bar men Akurvazir Gumazim, an nɨghnɨzir ekiam kamakɨn, gumazamizir nɨghnɨzir gavgavim an itiba a men akuragham. E nɨghnɨzir gavgavim an ikia, bizir e fogha iniamiba bagha mɨzua iti. Kamaghɨn amizɨma, e zurara bar puvɨra ingari.
